entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: we can uniquely identify keyless entities that have Distinct operation applied on them #26078
  • Query: further improve translation of queries with Distinct or Groupby in correlated subquery, when entity identifiers are not easy to obtain #26077
  • Update snapshots when a shared-identity entry is added #26076
  • Navigation to principal on deleted dependent is cleared when principal is detached #26074
  • 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10: Navigations can only target entity types with keys #26073
  • WHY NOT VIEWS !?!? #26072
  • Customization of the ordering of extensions #26071
  • CreateAggregate state is shared, breaking multiple use of an aggregate function in the same query #26070
  • Allow test seeding data to be intercepted/tweaked by providers #26068
  • Removing a migration adds a `(string)null` argument to all ToTable calls in the snapshot #26067
  • What is the recommended way to do DDD Value Objects in EF Core? #26065
  • optimize query sql #26064
  • .NET 6 RC1 - Migrations not going through/code-first not updating database #26063
  • Upgrading packages from .NET 5 to .NET 6 RC 1 seems to break existing migrations #26062
  • Scaffold-DbContext with NoPluralize flag incorrectly singularizes the navigation property name for the collection #26061
  • Scaffold-DbContext in EF Core results are different from models from edmx ( using Database first approach) #26060

Closed

  • Query: query with group by in subquery produces invalid SQL #15279
    6.0.0
  • Test that provider convention sets replace all instances of a given convention #26017
  • Problems with GroupBy #26046
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Migrations do not fully qualify types, resulting in compile errors #25933
  • Temporal tables tests are broken #26047
    6.0.0
  • Unable to translate collection subquery in projection #25315
    6.0.0
  • System.TypeLoadException after upgrade to 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10 : Method 'AppendIdentityWhereCondition' does not have an implementation #26059
  • Performance issue when using multiple includes and QueryFilters #25731
  • Query: parameter nullability sniffing broken for global query filters #24645
  • EF Core database insert fails when table has a SQL INSTEAD OF trigger #12064

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #24490 - Update exception message when correlated collection cannot be projected #26079
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26075
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Adding grouping tests from EF6 #26069
  • [6.0-rc2] Fully support int identity seed #26066

Merged

  • [6.0-rc2] Adding regression test for #15279 #26081
  • [6.0-rc2] Fix Fluent APIs on keys in model snapshot #26058
    Servicing-consider
  • [6.0-rc2] Query: Translate ToList over grouping element #26054
    providers-beware, Servicing-consider
  • Query: Fix temporal table tests #26056
    tell-mode
  • [6.0-rc2] Add regression test for #25315 - Unable to translate collection subquery in projection #26057
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26033
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26032
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26026
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Stabilize versions for 6.0.0 RTM #26051
    area-infrastructure
  • Query: Throw better error message when final result contains IGrouping #26050

Updated

  • [6.0] Fix update pipeline perf regression #26082
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
    waiting-for-response
  • [6.0-rc2] Fixup deleted join entities #26036
  • Update helix.proj #26055
